title: Ticket #6334: Only SIGHUP the CREDMON if contents of SEC_CREDENTIAL_DIRECTORY chnged
description:
While working in other code, I noticed that when the CredD does its "optimization" of not updating a credential in the SEC_CREDENTIAL_DIRECTORY if it already exists, even when the credential is not updated it still sends a SIGHUP to the CREDMON. This potentially creates extra work for the CREDMON and depending on the implementation may be causing extra load on the KDC or other services as well.

I don't believe anyone relies on that behavior. However, the code changes are unfortunately not as simple as you'd hope and so I am proposing this for the 8.7.X developer series instead of stable.
